name: Canalized
description:
Travel upstream across this canalized river while avoiding obstacles that can bend your mind. 

Your mission: fly as far as possible and check if everything is alright down the river. 

You'll need calm, attention and sensitivity to fly across the floodgates along the way. 

Up! Down! Up! How far can you go before crashing? Be sharp! Think fast, think right!

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

You can play clicking/touching or using your keyboard.

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
